title: Label release liners containing PCR content and unbleached fibres revealed by Ahlstrom - Packaging Europe
summary: Ahlstrom is launching new release liners made with recycled and unbleached fibers, aiming to reduce environmental impact in the label and packaging industry. These new liners, Acti-V RF Yellow and Acti-V RF Natural, are designed to be more sustainable by incorporating recycled content and minimizing the use of virgin fibers. The company believes these innovations will help drive the adoption of renewable materials and offer more environmentally friendly options for label printers and end-users.
product_or_process: Acti-V RF Yellow and Acti-V RF Natural release liners

greenwashing: There is no evidence of greenwashing in the article, as Ahlstrom clearly describes the use of recycled materials and the sustainability benefits of their new products.

title: Labelexpo Europe 2023 technology preview: A-Z - Labels and Labeling
summary: Labelexpo Europe 2023, a trade show for the label and package printing industry, took place in Brussels.  Over 200 companies showcased a wide range of innovations, including new presses, finishing systems, inks, coatings, and substrates.  A key focus was on sustainability and environmental responsibility, with many companies highlighting their efforts to reduce waste, conserve resources, and develop recyclable products.
